title: FARMbloomington
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Strives to be farm-to-table souring local and seasonal produce. A vegetarian special each day, like a black bean burger. Other vegetarian items on the menu include fried eggplant, tofu scramble, biscuits and gravy with mushrooms and peppers, cajun red bean & rice burger (vegan ask for soy sour cream & whole wheat pita).
